argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ho0f | |- 0hop : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | #P_ho0sub | |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ 0hop : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( T -op 0hop ) = ( T +op ( 0hop -op 0hop ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( T -op 0hop ) = ( T +op ( 0hop -op 0hop ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_hodidi | |- ( 0hop -op 0hop ) = 0hop |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( T +op ( 0hop -op 0hop ) ) = ( T +op 0hop ) |
| 6 |  | #P_hoaddid1 | |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( T +op 0hop ) = T ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( T +op ( 0hop -op 0hop ) ) = T ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( T -op 0hop ) = T ) |
